descriptions.en: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.*The user tackles the foe from a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.*
descriptions.de: Schaden hängt von den momentanen Initiativewerten des Angreifers und des Zielobjekts ab. Grundstärke = [abrunden(25 * InitiativeGegner / InitiativeAnwender)] +1
